channel.title: Spiritual Gifts on Jessica S. Marquis
channel.description: Recent content in Spiritual Gifts on Jessica S. Marquis

item.title: Excavating Accidentally Buried Talents
Too Close to Define
item.description: You know that experience when you’re so close to something you can’t really say anything about it? When it’s feels like you’re trying to build something and discover you’re using water instead of packing snow? When you’re afraid a remark about it would only touch part and miss the whole? I remember someone joking that if you need the definition of “psychology”, you should [counterintuitively] ask the first-semester psych major, not the PhD clinician.
